definitions.explanation_en: A feminine given name of English origin, derived from the name Anastasia, meaning 'resurrection' or 'rising again'. Commonly used in Western countries as a personal name.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自英语的女性名，由名字 Anastasia 演变而来，意为‘复活’或‘重生’。在西方国家广泛用作女性人名。
definitions.example_en: Stacey is the project manager who led the team to success.
definitions.example_cn: 斯泰西是带领团队取得成功的项目经理。
